page.title: 08GOLDEN ANNIVERSARY OF SCHOOL
page.content: {GOLDEN ANNIVERSARY OF CEFN MEIRIADOG {C.P.SCHOOL.28th.JUNE 1985. { }IN THE AFTERNOON THE CHILDREN HAD A PARTY WHICH LASTED FROM HALF PAST ONE TILL THREE O'CLOCK.THE EVENING CONCERT STARTED AT SEVEN THIRTY.IT WAS LATE STARTING BECAUSE MORE PEOPLE CAME THAN EXPECTED AND MORE CHAIRS HAD TO BE BROUGHT IN AND THE CHILDRENS CHAIRS HAD TO BE GIVEN TO THE PARENTS.THE CHILDREN HAD TO WAIT OUTSIDE UNTIL IT WAS THEIR GO.THE ROOM WAS JAM PACKED.AFTER THE PRESENT PUPILS HAD PERFORMED SONGS AND POEMS THERE WERE SOME POEMS AND SONGS PERFORMED BY THE EX-PUPILS.MESSRS EMYR THOMAS ABERGELE,EDUCATION DEPARTMENT;J.HUGHES,MAYOR OF COLWYN;& J.M.CHARLES(EX-HEADTEACHER) WERE AMONGST THE IMPORTANT GUESTS. { }
